data.actual_result: You can press the emojis on the menu and nothing will happen
data.expected_result: You should be able to choose the emoji on the last one
data.short_description: Can't select an emoji when input form is loaded up (Over char limit)
data.steps_to_repro: - Spam emojis in an input form like `:smile::smile::smile::smile::smile::smile::smile::smile::smile::smile::smile::smile::smile::smile::smile:` but couple of times (the higher the better) - leave the last one to be like `:smi`
